des: "This cocktail was invented in May 2013 in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. Its name, ingredients, and colour are inspired by the eponymous IkeaÂ® product. The recipe is the outcome of a rhetorical question posed while assembling IkeaÂ® furniture 'If the Lekman were a drink, what would be in it?.'"
ins: Pour lingonberry juice, vodka, and blue Curacao into a cocktail shaker. Add ice; shake. Pour into a lowball glass. Garnish with sour key candy.
